content:
746 
 
 
    (xvii) GOUU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at  not 
 more than two (2) sittings in subjects which  include 
 English Language, Mathematics and Economics.  
(xviii) PAUL requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes including English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics a nd any other two (2) 
relevant subjects.  
(xix) REDEEMERS requires five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other 
two (2) subjects in Social Sciences.  
(xx) CRAWFORD requires for Business Administration five (5) 'O' 
level credit passes to include English Language, Economics, 
Mathematics and at least two (2) from Business Methods, 
Accounting, Commerce, Geography and Government.  
(xxi) AAU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes including English 
Language, Mathematics, Econ omics, Government/History 
and any other subject.   
(xxii) WESTERN-DEL for Business Administration requires five (5) 
'O' level credit passes including English Language, 
Mathematics, Economics or Accounts, one other Social 
Science subject and any one (1) other subject of choice.   
(xxiii) NDU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) other 
subjects at not more than two (2) sittings.   
(xxiv) BELLS requires ‘O’ level pass in Physics for Business 
Computing and Information Technology.  
(xxv) CALABAR requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes  in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts 
or Social Science subjects.  
(xxvi) KWASU  
(a) For Acco unting requires: five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, 
Accounting and any other social science subject.  
(b) For Business Administration requires five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics 
and any other two (2) social science subjects preferably 
Business Studies/Commerce or English Language, 
Mathematics, Government and any two (2) social science 
subjects.
